If you found the `rhr` package useful for your work we appreciate if you acknowledge the package. We suggest to cite this manual with: 

> Signer, J. and N. Balkenhol, 2014, rhr: a R package for reproducible home range analysis; retrieved from _http://rhr.spamwell.net_

For BibTeX users: 

````
@Manual{rhr,
  author  = "J. Signer and N. Balkenhol",
  title   = "rhr: a R package for reproducible home range analysis",
  year    = "2014",
  url     = "http://rhr.spamwell.net"
}
````

Please do not cite this manual for publications that are cited in this manual. You should read and refer to the original publications.
